name: “Ghost Buses of Harvard Square” Collection -- Northbound (First of Two)
description: by Andrew Kingsbury -- This is a long exposure photograph of a ghost bus zooming northbound through Harvard Square and from 2018 when I first got into photography. I particularly like the illusion of the couple that appears terrified by the ghost bus. It was shot on an L16, which is a CRAZYYY looking camera with 16 lenses on the front (Google: “L16 camera” if you want to see the camera). FYI: My birthday is May 27, the same date as my Harvard 2021 Commencement and graduation!
